price: 在努哈之后，我毁灭了若干世代。你的主对于其仆人的罪行，足为彻知者和明察者。
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ نُوحٖۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā mina al-qurūni min baʿdi nūḥin wakafā birabbika bidhunūbi ʿibādihi khabīran baṣīran
